resources.string: Notification click will open App Ops.
Notification click will open Battery Stats.

After detect any unwanted wakelocks, will show you a notification, from which you can open page with additional info to view what causes the wakelock. Later then, if problem persists, will also set an alarm to your default alarm clock.
After detect any unwanted wakelocks, will show you a notification, from which you can open page with additional info to view what causes the wakelock.
Service is stopped and there will be neither notification nor alarm. Please note that service will start again right after boot or unplug charger.
Service is stopped during charging and can\'t be started now. Don\'t worry, it will start automatic after unplug charger.
If you want additional warning, you can activate alarm, just note that: it\'s actual alarm in your alarm application and will be set without your knowledge!
Note: The alarm will be set without your knowledge!

If you want additional warning, you can activate alarm, just note that: it\'s actual alarm in your alarm application and will be set without your knowledge!\nAlso, to use alarm in Lollipop, you must first grant permission to check notifications.
If you want service permanently disabled, just uninstall application.

App Ops is unavailable in Jelly Bean 4.2.

You can choose notification style - vibrate only or depending on ring style.

Note that if you're in call and using other than in-built Dialer, Skype, Viber, Hangouts or Facebook Messenger, there will be alarm during call.
In such case, stop service before attempt call, later e-mail me to exclude your preferred dial application.
. Press to send e-mail to developer.
Grant permission on Wakelock to proceed.
